tool.name: SAGA.ta_lighting.7
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayDEM False output_data_INSOLATION $output_data_INSOLATION name SAGA.ta_lighting.7 DEM $DEM STEPS $STEPS UNITS $UNITS HOUR_STEP $HOUR_STEP YEAR $YEAR prefer $prefer response $response outputType_INSOLATION $OutputSection_INSOLATION.outputType_INSOLATION transmissionMode_INSOLATION $OutputSection_INSOLATION.transmissionMode_INSOLATION

param.name: DEM
param.label: Elevation
param.help: Elevation The following data types are allowed in the txt file: png, x-ogc-envi, tiff, x-ogc-aaigrid

param.name: STEPS
param.label: Number of Steps
param.help: Number of time steps per year.

param.name: HOUR_STEP
param.label: Resolution [h]
param.help: Time step size for a day's calculation given in hours.

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_INSOLATION
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_INSOLATION
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: Calculates the annual potential total insolation for given time steps and stores resulting time series in a grid collection.
